content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. I aim high, so consider your first offer as a starting point for negotiations. Remember, I want to rent it out for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm seeking the lowest rental price for myself as a tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. I wish you luck in finding a place that fits your budget. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
